product_name: e.l.f. CosmeticsHalo Glow Blush Beauty Wand
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeVegane.l.f. Cosmetics' Halo Glow Blush Beauty Wand adds a radiant flush and pretty pop of color to your cheeks. The lightweight, liquid formula is infused with hydrating squalane and effortlessly blends into skin while the wand's cushion-tip offers a precise application.
details: DetailsBenefitsEasy-to-use liquid blush wand with a cushion-tip applicatorGives you a flushed, luminous complexionLiquid, buildable blush formula effortlessly blends into skinAvailable in an extended range of colors100% vegan, cruelty-free & Leaping Bunny CertifiedMade in a Fair-Trade Certified factoryKey IngredientsInfused with skin-loving 2% squalaneFormulated WithoutPhthalatesParabensNonylphenol ethoxylatesTriclosanTriclocarbanHydroquinoneItem 2609251How To UseGently squeeze wand and use the cushion-tip applicator to apply to the apples of your cheeks, then blend in color with your fingertips or e.l.f. Angled Blush Brush (sold separately).For a fully sculpted look, pair with the e.l.f. Halo Glow Contour Beauty Wand and Halo Glow Highlight Beauty Wand.IngredientsWater (Aqua), Hydrogenated Didecene, Isododecane, Glycerin, Propylene Glycol, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Mica, PEG-10 Dimethicone, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Squalane, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Dimethicone, Isoamyl Laurate, Hydrogenated Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Sodium Chloride, Synthetic Sapphire, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Polyglyceryl- 4 Isostearate, Propylene Carbonate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Tocopherol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Disodium EDTA, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Tin Oxide. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Red Iron Oxide (CI 77491).
how_to_use: Gently squeeze wand and use the cushion-tip applicator to apply to the apples of your cheeks, then blend in color with your fingertips or e.l.f. Angled Blush Brush (sold separately).For a fully sculpted look, pair with the e.l.f. Halo Glow Contour Beauty Wand and Halo Glow Highlight Beauty Wand.

reviews.headline: DO NOT BUY
reviews.comments: the applicator is a mess ans just really gross over a long time

reviews.headline: Beautiful
reviews.comments: This is very pigmented and lasts all day. I love that iit gives a glowy sheen after application. The tube can get a lot of product out which can lead to a dirty cap/full if you do not use all of the product on the applicator. I'm excited to try different shades.

reviews.headline: Great product; horrible packaging
reviews.comments: I had never used a liquid blush before and loved it. However the package leaks and now the sponge applicator has broken off inside the cap and I can't get it out. I still have a lot of product left and am not sure how I will continue to use it.  I do love elf products and will continue to use.  I will get the liquid blush in a different bottle next time. The one with the wand that pulls out of the bottle I think will be better.

reviews.headline: Elf beauty wand blush
reviews.comments: I can't say, enough about these blushes. They last all day and they are all so pretty. I get compliments all the time on itt.

reviews.headline: too glittery
reviews.comments: i like my blushes to be more on the matte side so i believe thats why i dont really like this one. it has a lot of glitter in it and i think it takes away from the pigment a lot. it was also very difficult for me to blend out.

reviews.headline: Too patchy
reviews.comments: I got 2 of the blush shades when i tried them they were glowy and had pigment but i strted to noice where the spots i put the apllicater on my face you could see it. Then i tried rubbing it and it dried really face so it just looked like a had patches.

reviews.headline: These are just a no for me
reviews.comments: They're patchy and idk i dont like the applicator its messy. I think its better to get this than the charlotte tillbury tho. I need to retry these bc i havent in a year. I like glowy makeup but idk

reviews.headline: Would get this product again
reviews.comments: I got it when I was trying to find a blush, and I love it! It's pretty convenient because it's like a blush and highlighter in one. I will say that if you want the pigment to really show, you may want to add more than one dot/pump.

reviews.headline: AMAZING!!!!!!!!!!!
reviews.comments: ok i bought this for the first time andâ€¦. (drumroll please) ITS AMAZING!!!!! i bought the highlighter in champagne campaign and i rlly liked it my only problem was that it leaked but i think that it was because i pumped out WAY TO MUCH. the blush went on so nicely and blended so well!!!! definitely will buy again. LOVE YOU ELF!!!!!!

reviews.headline: The most affordable cream blush
reviews.comments: The color, shine and pigmentation are amazing for a less than $10 blush, awesome for eye shadow cream too super easy to blend.

reviews.headline: Definitely!

reviews.headline: I would this product again and again
reviews.comments: I soooooooooo recommend thus if you need a slight touch of blush in your makeup routine. But the bottle can get messy some times

reviews.headline: Fun to add a dash of glow!
reviews.comments: Lightweight and easy to use. Make sure to spread it quickly as it dries fast. Love the added glow!

reviews.headline: Blends nicely but very messy
reviews.comments: I bought the blush, highlighter, and contour. When i twist the cap back on, the product oozes out of the seam. This makes it hard to store because it then gets all over everything else. I even tried using less and this still happens. Will be looking into other products. This was good for it's price though.

media.caption: Cheap and Great. You get both.

media.headline: Love the product, hate the packaging
media.caption: Hall Glow Blush

faceoff_positive.comments:
I wanted to purchase just one of these to decide if I was going to purchase any more in the future, I am. I ordered candlelit and I've seen people say it is a "blush topper," not for me. It honestly made me feel like I picked the wrong shade but this is a really nice, soft, peachy shade and with a beautiful champagne sparkle. Perfect color for spring. Before I put translucent powder on it was pretty but the translucent powder over it gave it the most beautiful, soft glow. From my experience with the highlighter it can go over powders without issue. So if you did want to use this as a topper I'm sure you could. It kind of blended in with the highlighter a little bit to the point where it was almost hard to tell the difference between the highlight and the blush which might be a good thing. I had no problems with the blush, highlighter or contour blending together. It's not patchy at all and is seamless.

My only problem with this product are those sponge tip applicators. I just think they're gross so I ripped it off.
faceoff_positive.headline: First impression

faceoff_negative.comments: I was so excited that I snagged 2 of the blushes on release day. But unfortunately mine are duds. I knew from watching others use these blush wands that you had to blend super quick so I was ready. I applied two dots and before I could even pick up my brush the product had completely dried and set in dots on my face. No matter what I did I could not get those dots to go away and I tried everything. I had no choice but to take off all my makeup and start again. I have tried twice since then to try to get this product to work for me but the dry time is immediate. Maybe I got a bad batch. I'm not sure. I reached out to customer service but they were not interested in helping. So disappointed! This is the worse Elf product I have ever used.
faceoff_negative.headline: Dries instantly
